# vfs_setlocklocal

**Function**

Mark a filesystem as using VFS-level advisory locking support.

## Declaration

```swift
void vfs_setlocklocal(mount_t mp);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount to mark.

## Return Value

void.

## Discussion

Advisory locking operations will not call down to the filesystem if this flag is set.
title: vfs_setlocklocal
